channel.title: redis on tedshd's DevNote
channel.description: Recent content in redis on tedshd's DevNote

item.title: redis - note
item.description: redis - note doc http://redisdoc.com/index.html php redis https://www.cnblogs.com/ikodota/archive/2012/03/05/php_redis_cn.html go redis https://godoc.org/github.com/go-redis/redis 連到 redis server local server redis-cli remote server redis-cli -h host -p port -a password Get all key KEYS '*' Troubleshooting ERR Operation against a key holding the wrong kind of value 取 Key 的類型不對 用 type <KEY> 來確認存的類型

item.title: Mac - php redis install
item.description: Mac - php redis install Mac Env Mac OSX 10.14.5 Step git clone https://www.github.com/phpredis/phpredis.git cd phpredis phpize && ./configure && make && sudo make install test php -r "if (new Redis() == true){ echo \"\r\n OK \r\n\"; }" Troubleshooting phpize 1. $ phpize grep: /usr/include/php/main/php.h: No such file or directory grep: /usr/include/php/Zend/zend_modules.h: No such file or directory grep: /usr/include/php/Zend/zend_extensions.h: No such file or directory Configuring for: PHP Api Version: Zend
